The Routing Loop

Finding Network Root Causes in Seconds with Digital Twins and Agentic AI

Hosts:
Matt Lehwess, Jamie Wenzel

Guests:
Imen GRIDA BEN YAHYA, Principal Solutions Architect, Telecom AI/ML, AWS

Abstract:
Network failures can often take hours to diagnose. This week on The Routing Loop, we'll show how a network digital twin with graph DB and Agentic AI can find root causes in seconds. Join Jamie, Matt, and Imen for a deep dive into making network operations faster and more reliable.
